tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE financial_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_date TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT,
    message TEXT
)
CREATE TABLE User ( user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, username STRING NOT NULL, email STRING NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE Loan ( loan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, user_id UUID REFERENCES User(user_id), amount DECIMAL NOT NULL, due_date DATE NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE Notification ( notification_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, user_id UUID REFERENCES User(user_id), message STRING NOT NULL, sent_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE financial_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(50),
    event_description TEXT,
    event_date DATE,
    user_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE loan_repayments (
    repayment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    repayment_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE account_thresholds (
    threshold_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    threshold DECIMAL,
    alert_enabled BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE loans (
    loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    loan_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    repayment_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE notifications (
    notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    notification_type VARCHAR(50),
    message TEXT,
    sent_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE thresholds (
    threshold_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    threshold_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    threshold_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);
